summary: Provides unit tests that verify the correctness of backend configuration classes for various machine‑learning models (Keras classification, TensorFlow Deeplab, TensorFlow Object Detection) within the Raster Vision framework. The tests exercise construction, default handling, template processing, protobuf task generation, configuration copying, and validation of error scenarios.
business_intent: Guarantees that backend configuration components correctly interpret and enforce user‑specified settings, thereby preventing misconfiguration and ensuring reliable model initialization in the Raster Vision pipeline.
